sentences.en: A pilgrim circling the Great Hall of Sera Monastery.
sentences.cn: 一朝拜者围著色拉寺大殿转经.

sentences.en: All along my pilgrim journey, Savior, let me walk with Thee.
sentences.cn: 在人生孤单旅程中, 恳求主与我同行.

sentences.en: But one man loved pilgrim Soul in you.
sentences.cn: 唯有一人爱你那朝圣者的灵魂.

sentences.en: Good pilgrim, you do wrong your hand too much, which mannerly devotion shows in this.
sentences.cn: 志诚的香客, 别过分错怪你的对手, 这正是最恭敬的虔诚.

sentences.en: He went to Mecca as a pilgrim.
Helena herself , clad in her pilgrim's weeds, arrived at the city of Florence.
sentences.cn: 海丽娜本人穿着香客的服装来到了佛罗伦萨城.

sentences.en: His aspect was perfectly that of a pilgrim , heightened also by an apostolic dignity.
sentences.cn: 他那副神态又象耶稣的门徒,更增添了他的威严.

sentences.en: I edged closer like a pilgrim approaching a shrine.
sentences.cn: 我像一位走近庙宇的朝圣者一样再往近走.

sentences.en: Juliet : Ay pilgrim, lips that they must use in prayer.
sentences.cn: 朱丽叶 是啊,信徒, 他们的嘴唇要用来祷告神明.

sentences.en: Matthew Gillman of Harvard Medical School and Harvard Pilgrim Health Care.
sentences.cn: ’目前,我们的研究小组正在研究这一重要问题. ”

sentences.en: Our pilgrim remained stupefied with undefined apprehensions.
sentences.cn: 我们的旅客给莫名的恐惧吓呆了.

sentences.en: The land of peace described in John Bunyan's Pilgrim's Progress.
sentences.cn: 约翰·班扬作品《天路历程》中描绘的安乐地.
清教徒殖民于普里茅斯.

sentences.en: They read stories about the Indians and the Pilgrim.
sentences.cn: 他们阅读有关印第安人和那些朝圣者的故事。

sentences.en: While budding , at thy sight, my pilgrim's staff.
sentences.cn: 一见了你, 我那朝拜的手杖.

trans.tran_cn: 香客，朝圣者，旅行者，追寻者，〈美〉新来移民，1620年移居美洲的英国清教徒
trans.tran_en: a religious person who travels a long way to a holy place
